text: فَلَمَّا رَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَبِيهِمْ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِنَّا ٱلْكَيْلُ فَأَرْسِلْ مَعَنَآ أَخَانَا نَكْتَلْ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ

translation.en.sahih: So when they returned to their father, they said, "O our father, [further] measure has been denied to us, so send with us our brother [that] we will be given measure. And indeed, we will be his guardians."
translation.id.indonesian: Maka tatkala mereka telah kembali kepada ayah mereka (Ya'qub) mereka berkata: "Wahai ayah kami, kami tidak akan mendapat sukatan (gandum) lagi, (jika tidak membawa saudara kami), sebab itu biarkanlah saudara kami pergi bersama-sama kami supaya kami mendapat sukatan, dan sesungguhnya kami benar benar akan menjaganya".
